name: WorldSavvy
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: world savvy
des:
World Savvy is not only an entertaining game but also educating and yet engaging, especially for kids. Travel to as many countries as possible with us and test your knowledge about them! How far can you reach?

Just say, "Alexa, start World Savvy!" and play to get started. Enable the skill and be a real world-savvy today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
